results.title: The 'Kadrey v. Meta' fair use ruling is just the start of a long, complex AI copyright battle
results.description: Meta scored a fair use victory in a high-profile AI copyright battle. How will this affect similar cases?On Wednesday, the judge in the landmark AI copyright case Kadrey, et al. v. Meta Platforms Inc. ruled in Meta’s favor. And U.S. District Judge Vince Chhabria seemed to do so reluctantly, calling his own ruling “in significant tension with reality.”Thirteen authors, including Sarah Silverman, Ta-Nehisi Coates, and ...

results.title: The voices from inside Iran the regime doesn't want you to hear
results.description: In a country where dissidents face arrest or even execution, 10 Iranians — including a teacher, a mother, and a labourer — put themselves at risk to document the war.

results.title: Trump axes trade talks with ‘difficult’ Canada
